
### Recursive Partitioning of Network Models

networktree provides tools to fit and analyse regression trees
with correlation-based network models (multivariate normal distributions).

### Installation

From [CRAN](https://cran.r-project.org/package=networktree):

```
install.packages("networktree")
```

From [GitHub](https://github.com/paytonjjones/networktree):

```
devtools::install_github("paytonjjones/networktree")
```
